original: 東漢侍御史。董卓初入京，把持朝政，專斷獨行，欲殺人以立威。擾龍宗因見董卓時未解劍，被董卓所殺。
text: The Servant of the Eastern Han Dynasty. Dong Zhuo first entered Beijing, controlled the government, acted arbitrarily, and wanted to kill people to gain power. Chu Longzong was killed by Dong Zhuo for failing to solve the sword when he saw Dong Zhuo.
